name: Blunt Right Slice
raw:
<font color=#009B00>

This Instruction Manual will teach you how to assemble a:
 'Blunt Right Slice'
The Construction kit. must be between Quality Level 61 and 80.
All other pieces must be of AT LEAST that level range... 
Add them using shift+right-click.
Add the pieces in the following order:

 1. One Handed Edged Weapons Construction kit.

 2. Notum Enriched Nano Paste - 1x Layer. . SkillTo Assemble: Nano Progra: 92-120

 3. Optimized Co-Weapon Interface. . SkillTo Assemble: Comp. Liter: 183-240

 4. Short Handle. . SkillTo Assemble: Weapon Smt: 214-280

 5. Notum Enriched Nano Paste - 2x Layer. . SkillTo Assemble: Nano Progra: 122-160
